CustomField.description: Formula field that is used in email templates to the Product Manager to display the value of the Catalog Change checkbox field.
CustomField.formula: IF( Catalog_Change__c , "A Catalog change has been requested, please create a task and assign it to Angie Johnson. Select Sales Enablement - ICB as the task type and subject. Please remember to paste the required template into the task request.", ".")
CustomField.label: Catalog Change Required Verbiage ProdMgr
